document_data.name: Hnalguk
document_data.mainbody: '''Hnalguk''' was a [[gnoll]] who led her fellow gnoll pack as shock troops in [[Mrolgyet's Legion]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Hnalguk always led her pack on the frontline owing to a need to run directly into a fight. She embodied the reckless nature and tactics of her forces.
document_data.History: Hnalguk led her advance forces in the battle between Mrolgyet's Legion and the [[Lords' Alliance]] on [[Harvestshield Mountain]]. They were briefly slowed by packs of local [[ghoul]]s before they began to scour the mountainside for Alliance troops. She was defeated in combat by a group of [[adventurer]]s from [[Waterdeep]].
